title: 7.1.1 Create aws_accounts database schema
body:
## Parent Issue
#29 - 7.1 AWS Account Connection

## Objective
Create database schema for storing AWS account connections.

## Implementation
```sql
CREATE TABLE aws_accounts (
    account_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(tenant_id),
    aws_account_id VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL,
    friendly_name VARCHAR(255),
    connection_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,  -- 'iam_role' or 'access_keys'
    role_arn VARCHAR(2048),
    external_id VARCHAR(255),
    access_key_id_encrypted BYTEA,
    secret_access_key_encrypted BYTEA,
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
    last_validated_at TIMESTAMPTZ,
    last_error TEXT,
    region VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'us-east-1',
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(),
    UNIQUE(tenant_id, aws_account_id)
);
```

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/models/aws_account.py`
- `alembic/versions/xxx_create_aws_accounts.py`

## Estimated Time: 1.5 hours
